general.description: It's not clear if this weapon was originally a laser cannon or ion cannon, but through many iterations of replacing parts with scraps combined prolonged has changed into something mostly unrecognizable. Functionally, it has evolved to be a mix of energy and ion weapon that would take a Za'lek scientist the good part of the decade to figure out and make for a good article in the peculiarly named Journal of Experimental Weaponry and Penguin Subspecies
